title: In-App Purchase
custom_preconds:
Given the user has a TestFlight build installed
And the user has navigated to a paywall

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps the Audio Yearly option
And enters a valid iTunes Sandbox account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the transaction is successful
And the user can dismiss the "Connect Purchase" screen
And the user will have Audio access
And the user will not see Lite ads

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the Audio Monthly user then accesses the TV paywall
And purchases TV Monthly successfully
And then links to an MLB account on the "Connect Purchase" screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will have access to MLB.TV and MLB Audio
And the user will not see Lite ads

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user uninstalls the build
And reinstalls the build
And accesses a paywall
And taps the "Restore" button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user's purchases (Audio Monthly and TV Monthly) will be restored
And the user can dismiss the "Connect Purchase" screen
And the user will have Audio and MLB.TV access
